metadata.name: Androsaurs
metadata.description: What is the price of arrogance? Even the greatest warriors struggle with hardships. Life can throw things at you that will test the content of your character. The universe is indifferent to us all. Chaos is the only true master. None of us has control. Some will try but they always fail... Androsaurs is a fantasy story about a young prince who must come to terms with his own limitations. He must check his privilege and learn some humility in the face of overwhelming opposition the likes of which his world has never seen! Oh, and its full of kick-ass medieval fights and sci-fi action for all ages! Crack it open and sit back. Let yourself be transported to the other side of the Universe. Brace yourself; it is going to be a bumpy ride!
